text:
There is a caching problem when the cache setting in IE is set to "automatic".
How to reproduce:
1. edit document in Xopus
2. save and exit
3. open Xopus again with the same document
   -> the "old" version will be shown 
   (changes from step 2 are not visible and will be lost when user saves again)
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
josias.thoeny@wyona.org
text:
Created attachment 16770
patch for usecase.xmap

This patch resolves the problem by disabling client-side caching for the xml
documents loaded by Xopus.
